Campaign Story:
In the year 2025 a deadly virus spread through the globe killing 80% of humanity and turning them into "zombies", the remaining humans were forced to seek shelter in space while they figure out how to stop the deadly virus. In the year 3201, the humans decided to send to Earth a special unit called COGRET to kill and clean the remaining humans that wear infected with the virus to restore the Earth.
